section.title: Installation Kit Instructions
section.p: When the disk where Content Fusion stores its data becomes full, you can follow these instructions to add a new disk with more space:

ol.li: Attach, format, and mount a new disk.

Change the current directory to the newly mounted disk and create a Content Fusion backup. The backup will be stored in the current directory.After the backup is created, it should be tested in a different machine to ensure that it works correctly.
Copy the contents of the /fusion/data directory to the newly mounted disk.
Ensure that everything works correctly. If you encounter problems, use the backup created in step 3.
